transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Customer: Hello Vishal ji?
Executive: Hanji sir.
Customer: Han Ilma ka phone aaya tha?
Executive: Ji boliye.
Customer: Ilma ne baat ki kuch aap se?
Executive: Nahi aise toh abhi meri baat nahi ho payi sir bataiye aap mujhe.
Customer: Main baat nahi ho payi kya?
Executive: Abhi baat nahi ho payi meri Ilma se.
Customer: Bataiye.
Customer: Hmm, acha.
Customer: Koi baat nahi maine Ilma ko bataya tha ki aap Vishal ji ko bata dena kyunki isme dikkat ek aur abhi aa gayi hai.
Customer: Ki usme kaisa tha ki photo upload hone deta hai, successful dikhata hai, thik hai?
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Aur phir jaise aadhe ghante ke baad phir se dekha toh photo waha se delete ho jata hai.
Executive: Toh abhi aapne recently jo check kiya usme kya photo delete ho gaya hai? 
Customer: Nahi nahi suno suno suno usme aisa ye hua hai jaise apni baat hui na last.
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Phir aap meeting mein chale gaye maine phone kiya tha aapko.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Par aap kuch woh madam bol rahe the. 
Customer: Haan? 
Executive: Ji. Uske baad maine bhi call back kiya tha shayad aapne uthaya nahi tha sir miss ho gaya hoga.
Customer: Nahi mere paas toh call nahi aayega phone toh mere paas hi hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Phone toh mere paas aaya nahi par aapka aap kuch meeting mein the woh madam bol rahi thi. Apni baat hui thi last uske baad suno phir woh maine Ilma ko bata diya ki aap unko bata dena kyunki maine kaha subah se wohi kaam kar raha tha isi ka. 
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Toh usme main ekdam fed up ho gaya kaha dusri cheez kya aa gayi abhi aap dekho jaise aapne bataya tha ki bhai dusri bhi ek product aap dekh ke check karke dekho thik hai?
Customer: Toh dusri ek product humne check kiya. Uska product ka naam hai Express D3, thik hai? 
Customer: Toh usme bhi yahi aaya photo upload karne diya, successful hua thodi der baad woh dekha na toh product ki information hi gayab ho gayi, complete andar jo vivran jo likha hota hai na.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Wohi nikal ji waha se.
Executive: Achha kya naam hai us product ka?
Customer: Hello?
Customer: Product Express D3.
Customer: Ye dusra problem aaya.
Customer: Pehle toh photo nahi lene deta tha woh toh samajh sakte hai chalo photo nahi lene diya.
Executive: Hanji hanji.
Customer: Par photo abhi toh photo toh chhodo woh bhi lene nahi deta hai kehne ka matlab information jo likhi hai na product ki jo information nahi hai likha hota hai.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Haan toh woh bhi delete kar diya.
Executive: Achha toh ye ye wala product ka naam hai na Hammer ye Express Heat and Water Resistance.
Customer: Express D3.
Executive: Haan matlab uska description mein aapne likha hua hai Express D3.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Hai na yahi product ki baat kar rahe hai na main ek minute photo bhej raha hu aapko rukiye.
Customer: Haan.

Executive: Check kariye.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Yahi wala hai na?
Customer: Ek minute.

Customer: Haan ye hai.
Executive: Yahi hai na?
Customer: Haan ye hai.
Executive: Thik hai. Thik hai main ek bari isko highlight karta hu sir.
Customer: Achha ye ye ye haan Vishal ji ye hone ka karan kya hai aap apni mechanism ek bar check karwaiye. Kyunki sir abhi kya hai ki abhi ek do nahi hai mere paas 125 products ka pura ka pura vivran aayega. Details change aayegi sabki jaise pehle purana Express D3 tha aur naya Express D3 mein de do aap change aa gaya hai par uska same rakha hai humne.
Customer: Kehne ka matlab. Kyunki uska sticker mere paas hai isliye usko hum nikal nahi sakte. Toh bucket ka maine change kar diya.
Executive: Ji samajh gaya main.
Customer: Toh ye hai usme kya aata hai main aapko phir se batata hu photo upload hone deta hai successful batata hai. Phir thodi der ke baad dekhte hai toh photo hi nikal jata hai pehla ye aaya jo star mein problem toh chalu hi hai abhi woh star ki baat kar raha hu thik hai?
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Haan dusra phir dusri product ke liye humne set kiya Express D3 ka toh usme toh pura description hi nikal diya.
Executive: Ji samajh gaya product ka.
Customer: Haan toh ye do problem hai aap uska jo bhi ho set kijiye apni taraf se thik hai kyunki usme kya hai ki abhi hum ek sath bhi nahi kar sakte jaise one by one hamara hota rehta hai na waise main aapko karta rahunga.
Executive: Thik hai aap mujhe allow kijiye main ek bari maine dal hi rakha hai iske liye main usko dobara ek bari is cheez ko bhi highlight karta hu.
Executive: Ji thik hai.
Executive: Thank you sir. Aap dekh lijiye kaise hota hai phir bataiye ki ho gaya hai toh mere ko bataiye toh main phir se ek bar baat karta hu ki abhi kya hoga abhi toh beech mein actually kya tha humne karne ke baad khana khane baithe.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Phir khana khane ke baad phir se woh kaam shuru kiya karne baithe na toh usme humko ye pata chala woh product ud gaya usme distribution chala gaya.
Executive: Ji samajh gaya main sir. Aap mujhe time dijiye sir thoda sa main aapko shamne se call karta hu thik hai. 
Customer: Thik hai sir thik hai thik hai ok ok ok.
summary:
Concerns:

- Photo gets deleted after being uploaded.

- Product information disappears after photo upload.



Resolution:

- Executive assured to highlight the issue.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call the customer back.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- photo upload, product information, express d3, technical issue
